scenes.title: Street Cafe
scenes.description: Sit back in this street cafe in Hamburg Germany and listen to the ambient street noise all around you.

scenes.title: California Cafe
scenes.description: Stop by this California Cafeteria for some authentic Menudo or Chilaquiles.

scenes.title: Wedding Car
scenes.description: Today is the big day, celebrate by taking a ride in this beautifully decorated car.

scenes.title: Roller Coaster
scenes.description: Enjoy a ride on this virtual roller coaster!

scenes.title: Cereal Bowl
scenes.description: Remember the cereal bowl scene in "Honey I Shrunk the Kids?"  Well this is like that.
